Boot Process

Booting

  1. UEFI:
    1. UEFI ROM.
    2. NVRAM.
    3. Disk + partition + EFI file for Windows boot manager (\EFI\Microsoft\Boot\bootmgfw.efi).
  2. Windows:
    1. Windows boot manager reads Boot Configuration Data (BCD) (\EFI\Microsoft\Boot\BCD).
    2. Windows loader (C:\Windows\system32\winload.exe).
    3. NT OS kernel (C:\Windows\system32\ntoskrnl.exe).
    4. Session manager subsystem (C:\Windows\system32\smss.exe).
    5. Windows login (C:\Windows\system32\winlogon.exe).

Commands

  • Mount EFI:

    # mountvol <DRIVE>: /s
